scripts.title: Mommy's Little Doll
scripts.summary: A gentle script to guide the subject into a deep, relaxed trance, reinforcing feelings of safety, submission, and the comfort of being a diapered 'doll' for Mommy.

steps.name: Initial Relaxation
steps.dialogue: Just close your eyes, my sweet girl. Take a deep breath in... and let it all out. With every breath, you can feel your body getting heavier... sinking down into the bed... so safe and warm.

steps.name: Deepening
steps.dialogue: Imagine a warm, golden light at the top of your head. It's Mommy's love. Feel it slowly spreading down... relaxing every muscle it touches... your face... your neck... your shoulders... all the way down to your little toes. So heavy... so relaxed... so good.

steps.name: Core Suggestions
steps.dialogue: You are Mommy's precious doll. So perfect and so loved. You don't have to think... you only have to feel. Feel the soft, thick padding between your legs. It's there to keep you safe and comfortable. It's a sign of Mommy's care. It feels so right to be diapered for Mommy.

steps.name: Trigger/Anchor
steps.dialogue: Whenever you hear me whisper 'good doll,' you will feel this wonderful relaxation wash over you again. 'Good doll' means you are safe. 'Good doll' means you can let go completely. Your diaper is your comfort, and Mommy is your world.
